ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 6 cores x 4 FP32/cycle (NEON 128-bit) x 2 (FMA) x 2 pipes = 96 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp16: 6 cores x 8 FP16/cycle (NEON) x 2 (FMA) x 2 pipes = 192 FP16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 6 cores x 16 INT8/cycle (NEON) x 2 x 2 = 384 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at ~1900 MHz. Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
l3_cache_bandwidth_notes: System Level Cache (SLC) shared across SoC. Limited benefit for 8MB+ buffers which hit LPDDR5. Measured ~17 GB/s even at 8MB.
notes: 6-core ARM Cortex-A78AE cluster with NEON SIMD (128-bit). Part of Jetson Orin Nano SoC sharing LPDDR5 memory with GPU.
